name: Scorched Earth
desc: Carpets the nearby earth in flames which damage enemies and heal Doom, while also granting him increased movement speed.

name: Guardian Angel
desc: Omniknight summons a Guardian Angel that grants immunity from physical damage. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter

name: Anchor Smash
desc: Tidehunter swings his mighty anchor to damage nearby enemies and reduce their attack damage.

name: Upheaval
desc: CHANNELED - A powerful slowing current that grows stronger as it's channelled. Lasts up to 16 seconds.  Enemies are slowed for 3 seconds after leaving the area or the spell ends.

name: Echo Stomp
desc: Elder Titan and his Astral Spirit both stomp the ground, damaging and knocking nearby enemy units unconscious around their locations.  The Elder Titan stomp deals physical damage, while the Spirit stomp deals magical damage.

name: Unstable Current
desc: Razor moves with increased speed, and hits a random nearby unit with a jolt of electricity every 5 seconds. The jolt deals damages, slows, and purges buffs from enemies. DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

name: Atrophy Aura
desc: Nearby enemy units are weakened, losing a portion of their base damage. If a unit dies while under this effect, Underlord gains bonus damage. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Reflection
desc: Terrorblade brings forth an invulnerable dark reflection of all nearby enemy heroes. Affected enemy heroes are slowed and attacked by their reflection.

name: Chaotic Offering
desc: Summons a Golem from the depths, stunning enemies for one second. The Golem lives 60 seconds, takes reduced damage from spells, has Permanent Immolation and Flaming Fists on attack. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Headshot
desc: Sniper increases his accuracy, giving him a chance to deal extra damage and briefly stop the movements of his enemies.
